Literature.Title: In vitro antifungal and fungicidal activities and erythrocyte toxicities of cyclic lipodepsinonapeptides produced by Pseudomonas syringae pv. syringae.
Literature.Author: Sorensen KN, Kim KH, Takemoto JY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans(MIC=2.5-5µg/ml),Candida kefyr(MIC=2.5µg/ml),Candida krusei(MIC=10µg/ml),Candida lusitaniae(MIC=5µg/ml),Candida rugosa(MIC=10-20µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis(MIC=2.5-5µg/ml),Candida tropicalis(MIC=2.5-5µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=2.5-10µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=2.5µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus ATCC 46645(MIC=5-40µg/ml),Mucor sp.(MIC=10->40µg/ml),Microsporum sp.(MIC=2.5-5µg/ml),Trichophyton sp.(MIC=2.5-5µg/ml)
